channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump lawsuit against Murdoch and 'Wall Street Journal' turns personal

item.title: Park Avenue Gunman Drove Cross Country Before the Attack, Police Said
item.description: The police said that he had a history of mental illness documented in Nevada and that it was unclear why he targeted the building.

item.title: Are prices going up because of tariffs? Here's what we know

item.title: 'Worst-case scenario of famine' unfolding in Gaza, warns U.N.-backed report
item.description: A U.N.-backed food security group says famine is unfolding in Gaza, with thousands of children malnourished and hunger-related deaths rising.

item.title: ‘Worst-Case Scenario of Famine’ Unfolding in Gaza, U.N.-Backed Body Says
item.description: Access to food has plummeted to unprecedented levels, a monitoring group warned, as global outrage over Israel’s aid restrictions persisted.

item.title: Paul Gallagher, Brother of Oasis Band Members, Is Charged With Rape
